content: Built a movie recommendation system that instantaneously captured user preference without needing user data history. Utilized collaborative filtering system as well as database retrieval method to provide recommended 10 movies.
title: MovieWatson

content: Designed an android App to collect real-time data that tracked user happiness. Used statistics to reveal the relationship between users happiness and the time spent on social media.
summary: An analysis of how social media influence human emotion.
title: how social media influence human emotion
